root.name: Breach 2
root.description: Breach 2 is a tactical turn based strategy game in which you command a team of space marines on various missions. The game is very similar to the original Breach but with better overall quality and different missions. As with the original game a level editor is included so that you can create your own levels.Again as will the original Breach your squad leader can advance in stats and basic ability on completion of a mission. How much the leader advances still depends on how successful the mission was.
